abstract: Reading the tea leaves in Brussels provides clues that the European Commission is preparing to allow Google to buy DoubleClick after a year-long review.
snippet: Reading the tea leaves in Brussels provides clues that the European Commission is preparing to allow Google to buy DoubleClick after a year-long review.
lead_paragraph: Whether or not Google’s bid to buy DoubleClick is completed, the world’s governments have certainly given Google a hazing, delaying the deal since it was announced last April.

headline.main: Hints That Europe Will Let Google Buy DoubleClick
